channel.title: Phone Internet Food India on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Phone Internet Food India on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: the weekend.
item.description: as the weekend approaches.. I will be engaging in another weekend long sabbatical from the internet. but this time it will be a theoretical four days with a 1 day disappearing act when I come back. so you should send me crazy messages to my phone(thanks to those that sent me messages the past couple days), which will probably be on for the duration of the trip. tonight it look sas though I will be involved in a talent show with my yoyo.
